name: Exploration Playground
description:
Exploration Playground is an Open World game where you go around and explore, while also possibly using the objects around

Some Things You Should Note:

  • This Game is Unfinished
  • There is no Audio
  • This game is only available for Windows x86 and x64. I do not have a Mac or Linux build
  • Only 2 objects are in the playground
  • Only 1 set resolution
  • There are 0 videos and images available on this page

Almost every feature was programmed with the use of the Brackeys tutorials on YouTube. Thanks to Brackeys for the tutorials
